items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js private proxy registry
items.title: verdaccio/verdaccio: A lightweight Node.js private proxy registry

items.content_html: PDFQuery is a lightweight semantic document retriever. It extracts text from PDFs, chunks it, creates vector embeddings using Sentence Transformers, stores them in FAISS, and allows semantic search to retrieve the most relevant document chunks based on user queries. Ideal for building search pipelines or integrating with downstream QA systems.
items.title: Brain-Bot-17/PDFQuery: PDFQuery is a lightweight semantic document retriever. It extracts text from PDFs, chunks it, creates vector embeddings using Sentence Transformers, stores them in FAISS, and allows semantic search to retrieve the most relevant document chunks based on user queries. Ideal for building search pipelines or integrating with downstream QA systems.

items.content_html: Part 2 of my PP5 project for my full stack software diploma (advanced frontend). This is the back end component to the application built with drf, simple jwt and cors that hosts the api to guild meet my scalable lightweight discord clone, for people who want to meet and make friends with others of like minded interests

items.content_html: User-crud-server is a lightweight API designed for managing user data with simple create, read, update, and delete operations. It offers a straightforward interface for developers to integrate user management into their applications efficiently.

items.content_html: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.

items.content_html: A lightweight, responsive Kanban board application built with React, Redux Toolkit, and react-beautiful-dnd. This project provides a Trello-like task management interface with intuitive drag-and-drop functionality for organizing workflow and tracking project progress.
items.title: AR10Dev/DragBoard: A lightweight, responsive Kanban board application built with React, Redux Toolkit, and react-beautiful-dnd. This project provides a Trello-like task management interface with intuitive drag-and-drop functionality for organizing workflow and tracking project progress.
